description.french: Gardez les 4 mêmes joueurs du début à la fin
description.italian: Completa una campagna dall'inizio alla fine con gli stessi 4 giocatori
description.koreana: 같은 4명의 플레이어와 함께 처음부터 끝까지 완료
description.spanish: Completa una campaña de principio a fin con los mismos 4 jugadores.
description.schinese: 以４名相同玩者从头玩到尾
description.tchinese: 以４名相同玩者從頭玩到尾
description.russian: Пройдите игру от начала и до конца с теми же 4-мя игроками
description.japanese: 同じプレイヤー4人で最初から最後までクリア
description.brazilian: Vá do início até o final com os mesmos 4 jogadores

description.english: Complete 10 campaigns on normal difficulty or above
description.german: Schließe die Kampagne (Normal oder höher) 10 Mal ab.
description.french: Terminez 10 fois la campagne dans le mode difficulté Normal ou supérieur
description.italian: Completa la campagna 10 volte a difficoltà normale o superiore
description.spanish: Completa la campaña 10 veces en dificultad Normal o superior.
description.schinese: 完成１０场普通以上难度的战役
description.tchinese: 完成１０場普通以上難度的戰役
description.russian: Пройдите кампанию 10 раз (на среднем уровне сложности или выше)
description.japanese: 難易度ノーマル以上で10のキャンペーンをクリア
description.brazilian: Complete a campanha (médio ou mais difícil) 10 vezes

description.english: Win a mission without firing a shot
description.german: Gewinne eine Mission, ohne einen Schuss zu feuern.
description.french: Terminez une mission sans tirer
description.italian: Completa una missione senza sparare un colpo
description.spanish: Completa una misión sin disparar ni una vez.
description.schinese: 在未击发任何炮弹的情况下完成任务
description.tchinese: 在未擊發任何炮彈的情況下完成任務
description.japanese: 一発も撃たずにミッションをクリア
description.brazilian: Vença uma missão sem nenhum disparo

description.english: Complete a campaign on Extreme
description.french: Terminez une carte en difficulté Extrême.
description.italian: Completa una mappa a difficoltà Estrema
description.spanish: Completa un mapa en Extremo.
description.russian: Пройдите карту на Экстремальном уровне сложности
description.japanese: エクストリームでマップをクリア
description.brazilian: Complete um mapa no modo Extremo
